solution_line_template: The perimeter of the garden is 2 * {length} + 2 * {width} = {2*length} + {2*width} = <<2*{length}+2*{width}={perimeter}>>{perimeter} feet.
Minus the two gates, he will need at least {perimeter} - {small_gate} - {large_gate} = <<{perimeter}-{small_gate}-{large_gate}={fencing_needed}>>{fencing_needed} feet of fencing.
